## Vector3.lerp() method

Linearly interpolates between the current vector and another vector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
lerp(vector3: Vector3, t: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

vector3


</td><td>

[Vector3](./server.vector3.md)


</td><td>

The vector to interpolate to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

t


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The interpolation factor. A value between 0 and 1.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Vector3](./server.vector3.md)

The current vector.
